query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `calendarEvents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `connectionId` int NOT NULL,
  `externalEventId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `summary` text,
  `description` text,
  `location` text,
  `startTime` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `endTime` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `isAllDay` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `status` enum('confirmed','tentative','cancelled') DEFAULT 'confirmed',
  `attendees` json,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `calendarEvents_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  KEY `connectionId_idx` (`connectionId`),
  KEY `startTime_idx` (`startTime`),
  KEY `endTime_idx` (`endTime`),
  KEY `externalEventId_idx` (`externalEventId`),
  CONSTRAINT `calendarEvents_connectionId_calendarConnections_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`connectionId`) REFERENCES `calendarConnections`(`id`) ON DELETE cascade
);
command:

  KEY `externalEventId_idx` (`externalEventId`),
  CONSTRAINT `calendarEvents_connectionId_calendarConnections_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`connectionId`) REFERENCES `calendarConnections`(`id`) ON DELETE cascade
);
